pullRequest.title: Fix querying information schema with empty name as predicate

nodes.bodyText: Can you please also add a test to TestInformationSchemaConnector where you run actual query and verify the result?

can you please extract an assertion method and call it twice: assertApplyFiterReturnsEmptyPrefixes(             ImmutableMap.of( new InformationSchemaColumnHandle("table_schema"), new NullableValue(VARCHAR, Slices.utf8Slice(""))));? and same for table_name

This .filter(value -> !value.isEmpty()) can be only called for columns that we known that cannot have empty values (catalog, schema, table, column) however filterString suggests it is generic. Maybe rename or filterEmptyValues(filterString(...))? So it would be used in place where column is known.
I was thinking of method like String<Set> removeEmptyValues(Set<String values). Then you would use it like filterString(constraint, column).map(this::removeEmptyValues)

static
this method is very much of utility kind, so I would define it at the very bottom of this class

commit.message: Fix querying information schema with empty name as predicate

afterCommit.message: Fix querying information schema with empty name as predicate
